join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=2 :random!random@random.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=2;subscriber=1 :random!random@random.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: !autoreply add|remove|editresponse|editpattern|list

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply what
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: !autoreply add|remove|editresponse|editpattern|list
